standalone.title: Standalone Items
standalone.description: Purchased or used directly (no crafting required).

items.name: Black Candle
items.flavour: A candle burned during unsanctioned maintenance windows. The flame feeds on momentum.
items.effect: Temporarily boosts point gain, but locks gambling for 2 minutes.

items.name: Blood Contract
items.flavour: An agreement signed in points. The system will honour it. In its own way.
items.effect: Sacrifice Nexi for a random outcome (double later, lose more, or trigger a global event).

items.name: Hex Coin
items.flavour: A coin that never lands cleanly. Nobody knows the odds. Including the coin.
items.effect: Random screen effect (mostly cosmetic chaos, sometimes bonus Nexi).

items.name: Trap Card
items.flavour: Activates automatically when targeted. Punishes confidence.
items.effect: Automatically reflects the next item used on you back to the user.

items.name: Veil of Ash
items.flavour: A thin veil that turns hostile intent into smoke.
items.effect: Blocks the next item used on you.

items.name: Moment of Silence
items.flavour: A brief pause in which nothing reaches you.

items.name: Reality Tear
items.flavour: Something slipped through. It stayed.

items.name: Mirror of Malice
items.flavour: The next intent aimed at you is returned with interest.
items.effect: Reflects the next item used on you back with enhanced effect.

items.name: Smoke Bomb
items.flavour: A cloud of confusion that clears the path.

items.name: Soul Thief
items.flavour: Steals points directly from the target. The price is paid in whispers.

craftable.title: Craftable Items
craftable.description: Created via recipes (uses materials + other items).

items.name: Phantom's Veil
items.flavour: Makes you invisible to item effects for a time. Crafted from shadows and silence.
items.effect: 10 minutes of immunity to all item effects.

items.name: Chaos Orb
items.flavour: A sphere of pure entropy. Reverses all active effects when shattered.
items.effect: Reverses all active effects (good becomes bad, bad becomes good).
items.recipe: 2x Cursed Essence, 2x Echo Stone, 1x Void Shard

items.name: Death's Whisper
items.flavour: A blade forged from final words. Steals points and silences in one strike.
items.effect: Steals 15–25% of target's Nexi AND mutes them for 3 minutes.
items.recipe: Silence Curse, Soul Thief, Necrotic Catalyst

materials.title: Crafting Materials
materials.description: Materials are mostly obtained via loot tables/trading.

items.name: Shadow Weave
items.flavour: A thread spun from darkness itself. Used in forbidden crafts.

items.name: Bone Fragment
items.flavour: A remnant of something that once was. Holds residual power.

items.name: Cursed Essence
items.flavour: Condensed malice in liquid form. Handle with care.

items.name: Echo Stone
items.flavour: A stone that holds echoes of past actions.

items.name: Soul Anchor
items.flavour: An anchor that tethers souls to the stream.

items.name: Blood Moon Token
items.flavour: A token earned under the blood moon.

items.name: Void Shard
items.flavour: A shard of pure void.

items.name: Necrotic Catalyst
items.flavour: A catalyst of death.

items.name: Silence Curse
items.flavour: A curse that silences.
